Join the New Life Cancer Support Group

Serving and guiding you through Biblical counseling

Get a ride to the doctor

We give rides to people who don’t have access to a ride to the doctor’s office. More text about our giving rides to people to doctor’s offices.

Schedule a Visit

Our cancer support group gathers monthly

Anyone is welcome to join the New Life Cancer Support Team. We meet at 7:00 PM on the 3rd Monday night of each month in the fellowship hall of New Life Baptist Church. Get directions.
